argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | invid.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 2 |  | invid.i | |- I = ( Id ` C ) |
| 3 |  | invid.c | |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) |
| 4 |  | invid.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Inv ` C ) = ( Inv ` C ) |
| 6 | 1, 5, 3, 4, 4 | #P_invfun | |- ( ph -> Fun ( X ( Inv ` C ) X ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_invid | |- ( ph -> ( I ` X ) ( X ( Inv ` C ) X ) ( I ` X ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_funbrfv | |- ( Fun ( X ( Inv ` C ) X ) -> ( ( I ` X ) ( X ( Inv ` C ) X ) ( I ` X ) -> ( ( X ( Inv ` C ) X ) ` ( I ` X ) ) = ( I ` X ) ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 7, 8 | #P_sylc | |- ( ph -> ( ( X ( Inv ` C ) X ) ` ( I ` X ) ) = ( I ` X ) ) |
